description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Dream Build Play 2009, top 20 finalist.  Gather your friends to play a trivia game in the style of a 1970s game show with hundreds of modern trivia questions read to the players.  Includes lots of cash and fabulous prizes.
